data.convo: Now I'm sure we'll never get all our things back . They're so clever these criminals . What's the point of collecting beautiful things for other people to steal ? I only wish it were this time yesterday . Think how happy we were . Now this.Things always go wrong . Perhaps we ought to get dressed and have breakfast . We'd feel better . I don't feel like breakfast . I don't feel like anything . Why are we so unlucky ? It's as if there were a jinx on us . Perhaps I'd better ring the police ... Yes . Of course . But what good will it do ? That man's miles away from here by now . In our car .
